column4: I am able to apt-cache show php5-fpm and get a response, but when I apt-get install php5-fpm I get an error: "E: Package 'php5-fpm' has no installation candidate"
I tried to use a PPA for this, and then removed it
I think that is my problem
how can I get PHP5-FPM installed?
*have
I have apt-get clean too
ppa-purge is your friend
that I what I used
sudo aptitude update
I ran sudo aptitude update, same results
what do you get when you type "sudo aptitude show php5-fpm"
I get the regular output
it looks like it would be htere
this is the output: http://pastebin.com/3jpBRz6k
what version of Ubuntu are you using?
10.10 server
cat /etc/lsb-release
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
have you tried to "sudo aptitude dist-upgrade"
no as I dont htink I need any upgrades
try grabbing the package from http://packages.ubuntu.com (copy link and paste, dl with curl or wget)
